title: The Bishop's Wife 1947 colorized (David Niven, Loretta Young, Cary Grant)

sources.title: Bishops Wife
sources.description: An Episcopal bishop (David Niven) has been working for months to raise money for an elaborate new cathedral, but is losing sight of his family and of why he became a churchman in the first place. His prayer leads to an angel (Cary Grant) being sent to assist him, but he becomes jealous of his new assistant's popularity with everyone around him, including his wife (Loretta Young). Based on the novel by Robert Nathan. Cary Grant as Dudley Loretta Young as Julia Brougham David Niven as Henry Brougham Monty Woolley as Professor Wutheridge James Gleason as Sylvester Gladys Cooper as Mrs. Hamilton Elsa Lanchester as Matilda If you have a request or a comment for me, please go to the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
